data.name: Abomination's Prison
data.desc: Add 1 "Unchained" card from your Deck to your hand. If this Set card is destroyed by card effect: You can Special Summon 1 "Unchained" monster from your Deck. You can only use each effect of "Abomination's Prison" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
